Keep New Zealand Beautiful Awards: Rotorua snags best loo, Tauranga and Whakatāne big winners https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/keep-new-zealand-beautiful-awards-rotorua-snags-best-loo-tauranga-and-whakatane-big-winners/ UDIVNS7VN5BCBI6MCMZIAVCNDA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/keep-new-zealand-beautiful-awards-rotorua-snags-best-loo-tauranga-and-whakatane-big-winners/ UDIVNS7VN5BCBI6MCMZIAVCNDA/ The Keep New Zealand Beautiful Awards were announced at Parliament House yesterday. Thu, 09 Nov 2023 22:03:42 +0000 Tauranga won the most beautiful large city award while a new wharepaku at the Ōkere Falls Scenic reserve is the country’s top loo.

Ruthless-Empire homicide: Call for sightings of vehicle after ‘items removed’ from scene - police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ruthless-empire-homicide-police-set-to-speak-to-media-regarding-toddlers-killing/5LD7HB5XI5AI3PJAQ3EPVV4GFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ruthless-empire-homicide-police-set-to-speak-to-media-regarding-toddlers-killing/5LD7HB5XI5AI3PJAQ3EPVV4GFE/ Sam SherwoodThe toddler was living at a home on the Lower Hutt suburb of Taitā. Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:55:00 +0000 Police are seeking sightings of this silver sedan between October 22, the day toddler Ruthless-Empire died, to October 24. Photos / Mark Mitchell / Supplied
David Seymour says short second meeting with Winston Peters was ‘productive’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/david-seymour-and-winston-peters-book-second-meeting-after-initial-congenial-and-promising-meeting/WIPBYKR7W5AOPBWNC6YXZFZXPM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/david-seymour-and-winston-peters-book-second-meeting-after-initial-congenial-and-promising-meeting/WIPBYKR7W5AOPBWNC6YXZFZXPM/ Claire Trevett, Adam Pearse, Michael Neilson, Kirsty WynnThree-way coalition handshake 80 per cent there, says Act leader.Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:51:41 +0000 Coalition talks between Christopher Luxon, Winston Peters and David Seymour are down to 'brass tacks' according to Seymour.
Covid-19: Fifth wave apparent as Kiwis fail to take up booster https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/covid-19-fifth-wave-apparent-as-kiwis-fail-to-take-up-booster/5W2OLDCMOZDUXIAPBBKTP2QFZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/covid-19-fifth-wave-apparent-as-kiwis-fail-to-take-up-booster/5W2OLDCMOZDUXIAPBBKTP2QFZ4/ Wastewater testing and the number of hospitalisations suggest the virus is prevalent. Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:09:02 +0000 Many Kiwis were not aware they could get a booster to strengthen their protection against the virus.
